segments.text: I notice the girl with her arm outstretched, waiting expectantly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eagerness is kind of sweet, but I can't shake the feeling of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just looking at her makes me recall the times I got in trouble for sneaking snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really be aware of whatâ€™s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but it feels so silly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That giant cookie jar is tantalizing for the children, but they don't see the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos unfolding feels like a perfect storm waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
